justification: "To assess trusting behaviour, participants engaged in 10 rounds of an interactive multiround 'trust game'"

measured_by: Investment amount in first round of Multiround Trust Game
justification: "we analysed amount invested in the first round as an index of a priori, initial ('unconditional') trust"

measured_by: Average round-by-round investments in Multiround Trust Game
justification: "we ... analysed round-by-round investments as an index of mean trust"

measured_by: Relative change in investment following partner repayment in Multiround Trust Game
justification: "we derived a measure of reciprocity, ... defined as relative change in investment from one round to another in response to a change in repayment by the partner"

measured_by: 'Social Risk Aversion' parameter from I-POMDP model of Multiround Trust Game
justification: "investment decisions ... are captured by seven parameters; namely Social Risk Aversion, Theory of Mind, Planning, ..."

measured_by: 'Irritability' parameter from I-POMDP model of Multiround Trust Game
justification: "Irritability is a parameter ... that governs a shift from a 'rational' ... state to an 'irritated' state"

measured_by: PCA composite score from MOPS and APQ
justification: "We calculated a multi-modal composite score for family adversity ... using ... MOPS [Measure of Parenting Style] and the APQ subscales"
"The MOPS is a self-report measure that assesses perceived parenting styles across three domains; indifference, over-control and abuse"
"We used the Cambridge Friendship Questionnaire (CFQ) to assess the perceived quality of peer relations"
